description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • Develop and enforce license sales (all Oracle Software products) in Mongolia within all market industries to achieve Quarter and annual targets.
  • Existing Oracle accounts management and new account development identifying prospective customer need and pushing proper Oracle solutions to satisfy customer requirements
  • Driving business development, presales activities, seminars for customers/partners
  • Working with Oracle Alliance and Channel Partners to drive revenue, arranging joint partner-marketing campaigns
  • Driving marketing: customer database development and update, product marketing campaigns, advertising, and events
  • Coordinating and initiating demand generation activities across Mongolia
  • Leverage sales initiatives, phone sales campaigns through customer database to achieve business goals
  • Provide weekly accurate sales forecasts and performance reports to Line Manager located in Moscow


 

QUALIFICATIONS AND REQUIREMENTS:


 

  • 5+ years of sales experience in an IT environment
  • University degree
  • Knowledge of Mongolian IT market - essential
  • IT technology sales background - essential
  • Knowledge of Oracle’s core products or similar
  • Readiness to intensively travel throughout region and sometimes abroad
  • Ability to understand and analyze the industries and market
  • Strong planning skills
  • Good communication, negotiation and influencing skills
  • Customer care orientation
  • Sense of responsibility for the success of customers, partners, peers and team(s)
  • Proactive, creative and innovative thinker/implementer
  • Motivation to continuously expand personal professional knowledge
  • Ability to work in a high pressure, fast moving and challenging environment
  • Native or Fluent Mongolian - essential
  • Russian language is a plus
  • Fluent written and spoken English is essential
  • Readiness for Relocation to Mongolia, Ulaan Batar is essentail
  • Citizenship - Mongolia OR Russia
name: Oracle Sales Representative in Mongolia
